title: Enhancing Organizational Development Practical Competencies: Strategies for Creating School Learning Environments through Educational Leadership

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for corporate management/HR/administrative staff

learning_goals: Learners can explain the six dimensions of the educational leadership model (protecting instructional time, maintaining high visibility, providing teacher incentives, promoting professional development, offering learning incentives, establishing high expectations).
Learners can develop and apply a checklist for diagnosing school learning environments to field cases.
Learners can propose improvements to learning environments through collaborative problem-solving activities in a blended learning setting.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
